info.title: QPP NG Integration Hub
info.description: The QPP NG Integration Hub connector offers a comprehensive suite of actions for seamless integration to the Quark Publishing Platform NextGen. Effortlessly retrieve and manage user metadata, asset information, Users and more. Streamline your processes by leveraging a wide range of actions, from checking group memberships to uploading and downloading files. Simplify your QPP NG interactions and enhance your workflows with this versatile and powerful integration hub.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Register a webhook for certain event.

type.description: Describe Webhooks Type that will be listened to ,Such as Event etc.

name.description: Unique Name to Describe Webhook Purpose and Meaning etc.

auxData.description: AuxData if provided any while registering.

messageAttributes.description: Message Attributes for given webhook event

newData.title: New Data

post.description: Registers a webhook for a given event and Change type.
post.summary: Triggers when an event occurs for an Already Registered Webhook

parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

name.description: Unique Name to Describe Webhook Purpose and Meaning etc.

object.description: Describes the type of Object to listen to Like ASSET etc.

items.description: Describes the Type of Change to Listen to.

delete.description: Deletes an Already existing webhook for a given event and Change type.

parameters.description: Name or Id for the existing webhook on the environment.

200.description: Returns a json object containing status as SUCCESS and deleted webhook's basic information.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: QPP Platform Asset Id.

multiValued.title: Multi Valued
multiValued.description: Indicates if the attribute is multi-valued.

200.description: Successful response with empty body

get.description: Get Asset Data for given Asset Id.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Id for the Asset on QPP NG Platform being Pointed to.

200.description: Found the Asset data.

401.description: AssetNotFoundException:If the child asset of the relationship does not exist.

get.description: Get Attribute Values for Comma Separated Id's.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Id for the Asset on QPP NG Platform being Pointed to.

parameters.name: attributeIds
parameters.description: Attribute ids should refer to the QPP Server's attribute ids.

200.description: Found the Asset attribute values by id.

401.description: AssetNotFoundException:If the child asset of the relationship does not exist.

get.description: This request will return either true or false that a user is member of group specific to userId and GroupId.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of QPPNG User.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id for Group In QPPNG.

200.description: Returns either true or false.

get.description: This request returns an array of applicable routings groups for the given collection for the specified workflow and status. This will return all collection mapped groups whose userclass is the same as one of the status mapped userclasses.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Variable collectionId should refer to the QPPNG Colllection Id.

200.description: Returns a list of applicable routing GroupInfo objects for the given collection and status.

401.description: InvalidCollectionException:If the given collection either does not exist or the logged on user has no access to this collection. Exact reason of the exception can be known by calling getExceptionCode() of the exception.

get.description: This request is used to fetch the metadata of a specified user.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id for the QPPNG User.

200.description: Returns an userInfoList object with its metadata.

get.description: This request will return user metadata specific to username.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: This reffers to the Username for QPPNG User.

200.description: User Found.

get.description: Request will return asset download info which can be used together with Download Blob Action to Download The asset Stream.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: AssetId should refer to the QPP Server's Asset.

parameters.name: minorVersion
parameters.description: Minor Version should refer to the required Asset's minor version. Provide 0 to fetch metadata of latest version.

parameters.name: majorVersion
parameters.description: Major Version should refer to the required Asset's major version. Provide null to fetch metadata of latest version.

200.description: Will return asset  download info.

get.description: This request will return list of users and all their metadata specific to group Id.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Group Id should refer to the QPPNG Group.

200.description: Returns list of user for group.

get.description: Get Attribute Values for Comma Separated names.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: AssetId should refer to the QPP Server's Asset.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Attribute Names String should refer to the QPPNG Server's attribute Names, Comma separated if multiple.

200.description: Found the Asset attribute values by id.

401.description: AssetNotFoundException:If the child asset of the relationship does not exist or lie in a collection that is not accessible to the logged in user.

get.description: This request is used to Download file by input stream from Download URL.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to

parameters.name: fileIdentifier
parameters.description: file Identifier refers to type of file.

parameters.name: contextId
parameters.description: ContextId id refer to resource info.

200.description: Returns array blob type of storage rules by blobType

$content-type.title: Content type
$content-type.description: The content type of the document, e.g. application/pdf.

$content.title: Content
$content.description: The content of the document in Base64 encoding.

put.description: This request is used to upload file by input stream.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to

parameters.name: fileIdentifier
parameters.description: File Identifier is refers to type of file.

parameters.name: contextId
parameters.description: Context Id refers to resource info.

parameters.name: InputStreamResource
parameters.description: Input Stream for resource , Needs binary Input.

200.description: Returns Success Code with Empty Body.

post.summary: Get Paginated Query Results with Filters
post.description: This request returns paginated Query Element and details of a Query stored in the system with specific filter in query.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: This refers to an Existing QPPNG Query Id.

parameters.name: queryFiltersAndDisplay
parameters.description: Query Filters And Display information included in the query definition

200.description: This will return list of queryresultelement object for query.

post.description: Request will check-in a local file, as per given Qpp attribute values array,For example Required Attribute value are Name,Collection,extension etc to check-in an asset to QPPNG Platform.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: _skiptoken
parameters.description: Number of Attributes/domains to Skip

parameters.name: createMinorVersion
parameters.description: Variable createMinorVersion should refer to true or false for creating version for checking.

parameters.name: Asset
parameters.description: Contains asset metadata in the form of array of attribute values.For example Required Attribute value are Name,Collection,extension etc to check-in an xml asset

200.description: checkin asset successfully.

401.description: MinorVersionNotSupportedException :This exception is thrown while trying to create asset's minor version when it is not allowed in the revision control settings of the collection(in which the asset is being checked-in) for the given content type.

post.description: Request will check-in and Update an already exiting asset in QPPNG. Asset Needs to be checked Out before hand. Use checkout action before.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: createMinorVersion
parameters.description: Variable createMinorVersion should refer to true or false for creating version for checking.

parameters.name: Asset
parameters.description: Contains asset metadata in the form of array of attribute values.For example Required Attribute value are Name,Collection,extension etc to check-in an xml asset

assetId.title: Asset Id
assetId.description: Asset Id for the Asset to be checked-in

200.description: checkin asset successfully.

401.description: MinorVersionNotSupportedException :This exception is thrown while trying to create asset's minor version when it is not allowed in the revision control settings of the collection(in which the asset is being checked-in) for the given content type.

get.description: This request returns all the metadata of a specified workflow by name.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: workflowName
parameters.description: Workflow Name for whom Meta Data needs to be fetched.

200.description: Returns Workflow object with all the metadata.

400.description: QppServiceException: Unexpected exception while processing request.

get.description: Get Child Asset Relations for a give Parent Asset Id.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: parentAssetId
parameters.description: Parent Asset Id should refer to the QPP Server's parent Asset.

200.description: Returns an assetRelationInfoList between assets.

401.description: AssetNotFoundException:If the child asset of the relationship does not exist or lie in a collection that is not accessible to the logged in user.

get.description: This request returns all existing attributes with their metadata in QPPNG Server specific to names.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: attributeNames
parameters.description: Attribute Names String should refer to the QPP Server's attribute Name, Comma Separated If Multiple.

200.description: This request returns all existing attributes with their metadata of QPP Server.

post.description: Creates a new attribute and returns its id and After successful creation of attribute message.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: Attribute Definition
parameters.description: Request body to create Attribute

200.description: Returns a attributeInfoList object containing a list of successfully created attribute.

post.description: Creates a new attribute and returns its id and After successful creation of attribute message.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: _skiptoken
parameters.description: Number of domains to Skip from Domain Id dropdown

parameters.name: Attribute Definition
parameters.description: Request body to create Attribute

200.description: Returns a attributeInfoList object containing a list of successfully created attribute.

post.summary: Update Attribute Mapping for Content Type
post.description: This request is used to update the attribute mapping of content types and their children with the specified map of attributes in request Body

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: attributeId
parameters.description: Attribute ids that needs to be mapped.

parameters.name: contentTypeIds
parameters.description: Content Types on which these Attributes needs to be mapped to.

200.description: Successful Added with empty body response

get.summary: Get Content Types Info by Name
get.description: This request is used to retrieve content type info by content type name.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: contentTypeName
parameters.description: Name for the content type.

200.description: Returns array of ContentTypeInfo.

post.description: This request will create a query with definition and details of a query in request Body.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: _skiptoken
parameters.description: Number of Attributes to Skip from Attribute Dropdown

parameters.name: QueryDefinition
parameters.description: QueryDefinition Required for creating a Query

200.description: will create query and return with id.

get.description: This request will return all the query with there definition.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

200.description: list of all Queries wirh thir definition object.

get.description: This request is used to fetch all users.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

200.description: Returns an userInfoList object containing metadata of users in the form of an array.

post.description: This request returns the stream after publishing an asset into a specified format using the publishing channel.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Variable assetId should refer to the QPP Server's Asset.

parameters.name: publishingChannelId
parameters.description: variable channelId should refer to Id of channel to be used.

200.description: Returns the filestream after publishing an asset into required format.

400.description: AssetNotFoundException: If given assetId does not exist or the asset lies in a collection that is not accessible to the logged in user. The specific reason for the exception can be determined by calling getExceptionCode().

post.description: Marks the asset with the given assetId as Checked Out

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Variable assetId should refer to the QPP Server's Asset.

200.description: return an asset with checkout

401.description: InvalidAttributeValueException :This exception can be thrown while setting some attribute value.

get.description: This request will the list of relation of an parent asset relation

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to points to.

parameters.name: childAssetId
parameters.description: Variable childAssetId should refer to the QPP Server's child asset which has raltion with parent and for whom parent relations needs to be find out.

200.description: Will return the list of asset relation

401.description: AssetNotFoundException:If no asset corresponding to the given id exists or the asset lies in a collection that is not accessible to the logged in user.The specific reason for the exception can be determined by calling getExceptionCode()

get.description: This request is used to get the metadata of all the domains that exist in the Enviroment.Internal Action to facilitate for other action params.

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to point to.

parameters.name: _skiptoken
parameters.description: Number of Domains to Skip.

200.description: Returns an attributeDomainInfoList object containing the metadata of the all the attribute domains.

401.description: InvalidAttributeValueException: This exception can be thrown while setting some attribute value.

get.description: getAllAttributes

parameters.name: new_url
parameters.description: Url for the Host environment that This Action needs to point to.

parameters.name: _skiptoken
parameters.description: Number of Attributes to Skip

200.description: return an asset with checkout

401.description: InvalidAttributeValueException: This exception can be thrown while setting some attribute value.

userModifiable.description: Specifies whether users can modify attributes within this domain.
